price: 39 Il les ressuscitera afin de leur exposer clairement la vérité au sujet de laquelle ils s’opposaient et pour que les impies sachent qu’ils mentaient[701].
arabic: لِيُبَيِّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي يَخۡتَلِفُونَ فِيهِ وَلِيَعۡلَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ كَٰذِبِينَ
footnotes: [701] Notamment en jurant qu’Allah ne ressuscitera jamais les morts.

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: liyubayyina lahumu alladhī yakhtalifūna fīhi waliyaʿlama alladhīna kafarū annahum kānū kādhibīna
